scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm-cjs
scripts.docs: api-extractor run && api-documenter markdown --input-folder temp --output-folder docs
scripts.docs:temp: api-extractor run && api-documenter markdown --input-folder temp --output-folder temp/docs
scripts.check-api: rimraf temp && npm run docs:temp && node ../../scripts/shallow-dir-diff.js docs temp/docs
